column6:
Farmhouse Style ~ Enjoy this Romantic Getaway for two located just 2 blocks off Main Street in Fredericksburg's Historic District.

This home features a step back in time with its beautiful vintage farmhouse furnishings and cozy atmosphere that is sure to make your stay a memorable experience. 

Kick back and relax in this peaceful and private setting or take a stroll downtown and enjoy a unique shopping and dining experience. 

We strive to make your stay one that you will not soon forget.
column9: "A Feathered Nest" - Cozy Farmhouse Close to Main
